item.title: Ready for Enterprise
item.description: So, I joined a really good tech company a few months ago. I thought that this kind of companies doesn’t exist, but no. And I would like to share minimal requirements for people who would like to work in. This is philosophical requirements, you will not see tech specs here such a Postgres or php 7.2, this is more about your behavior. First of all, let me talk about mentoring. When I came I was mentored by team lead, senior guy and project manager.
